context: Hello, how are you this afternoon? What kind of movies are you interested in?
Hi, sorry. I'm great, thanks for asking. I love a good animated movie like Coco (2017) which I recently seen.
That is a great movie! Let me put on my thinking cap.
I also love The Incredibles (2004) and can't wait for the new Incredibles 2 (2018)
It's out on the 15th of this month I believe.
That is a great movie if you like animated movies.
OMG! Yes, I loved that movie! I am Merida! lol
Yes, I'm excited to see Incredibles 2 (2018) as well.
I also can't wait to see Ralph Breaks the Internet (2018) I loved the first one Wreck-It Ralph (2012) I'm sure it will be just as great!
resp: Do you like Frozen (2013) ? Such great music.

context.content: Hello
Hi! What kind of movies do you like?
I enjoy movies that are both entertaining and emotionally engaging. I also love romantic movies with a heartwarming love story. Do you have any recommendations that fit these criteria?
context.feelings: I'm excited to explore new movies and see if they match my preferences. I hope the recommender suggests something that's both entertaining and emotionally engaging. Let's see what they recommend.

context.content: Have you seen The Notebook (2013)?
I haven't seen The Notebook (2013) yet. Can you tell me more about it?
context.feelings: I haven't seen The Notebook (2013) yet. I wonder if it's both entertaining and emotionally engaging, with a heartwarming love story. I hope it fits my preferences. The recommender is doing a good job of recommending movies, but I need more details to decide.

context.content: It's about a woman who falls in love with a man who changes his life every day. It's really good.
What's the setting of The Notebook (2013)? Is it a humorous and entertaining flick, emotional and thought-provoking drama, and a romantic and heartwarming love story?
context.feelings: I like the idea of a love story, but I'm not sure if it's both entertaining and emotionally engaging. The recommender seems to be on the right track, but I need more details to decide. I'll ask for more information about The Notebook (2013).

context.content: I would say it's a combination of both. It has Julia Roberts and she's writing a love story about a man that changes his whole life every time he meets someone new. It is really good!
Is there a lot of humor and entertainment in The Notebook (2013)? I want to make sure it's not too heavy and has some lighthearted moments too.
context.feelings: I think The Notebook (2013) might have the emotional and thought-provoking drama I'm looking for, but I'm not sure if it has enough humor and entertainment. The recommender seems enthusiastic about it, but I need to make sure it fits all my preferences before accepting the recommendation.

context.content: Yes, it is. It was really good and has a lot to offer.
That sounds interesting. Can you tell me more about the humor and entertainment in The Notebook (2013)? I want to make sure it's a good balance for me.
context.feelings: I think The Notebook (2013) might be a good fit for me. It seems to have a mix of humor, emotion, and romance. I'm excited to watch it. The recommender did a good job explaining the movie to me, but I wish they had provided more specific details about the humor and entertainment in the film. Overall, I'm feeling positive about this recommendation.

context.content: It's about two people who fall in love and have a lot in common. It stars Hugh Grant and has great comedic scenes.

context.feelings: I'm not sure if The Notebook (2013) perfectly combines humor, entertainment, emotional drama, and romance.
